ground_truth.thought: 分析共享经济在金融服务领域的创新趋势
ground_truth.name: FinancialTrendAnalysis.analyze_shared_economy_trends

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinancialTrendAnalysis.analyze_shared_economy_trends', 'description': 'Analyze the innovation trends of the sharing economy in the financial services sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'literature_count', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'Number of research papers to review.'}, {'name': 'platform_data_year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'Year to gather data from major sharing finance platforms.'}, {'name': 'regulatory_changes', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to study changes in regulatory policies.'}, {'name': 'future_innovations', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'Number of years to forecast future innovations.'}, {'name': 'risk_prevention', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to gather risk prevention measures.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'Innovation trends in sharing economy in financial services.'}, {'name': 'regulatory_updates', 'description': 'Updates on financial regulatory policies.'}, {'name': 'future_directions', 'description': 'Forecasted future innovations in sharing finance.'}, {'name': 'risk_measures', 'description': 'Risk prevention measures in sharing finance.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名金融分析师，想要分析共享经济在金融服务领域的创新趋势。首先，我需要查阅30篇关于共享金融的研究文献。然后，获取2022年以来主要共享金融平台的交易规模数据。接着，研究金融监管机构对共享金融的监管政策变化。最后，通过金融数据获取未来三年共享金融的创新方向，并获取一些参与共享金融的风险防范措施。当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析共享经济在金融服务领域的创新趋势
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'literature_count'的值是什么?
当前工具的参数'platform_data_year'的值是什么?
当前工具的参数'regulatory_changes'的值是什么?
当前工具的参数'future_innovations'的值是什么?
当前工具的参数'risk_prevention'的值是什么?

{'trends': 'Increasing use of blockchain for secure transactions, rise of peer-to-peer lending platforms, and growth in micro-investment opportunities.', 'regulatory_updates': 'Stricter data protection laws, introduction of sandbox environments for fintech startups, and enhanced consumer protection measures.', 'future_directions': 'Expansion of AI in personalized financial advice, integration of IoT for real-time financial tracking, and development of decentralized finance platforms.', 'risk_measures': 'Implementation of robust KYC/AML processes, establishment of emergency liquidity reserves, and development of comprehensive insurance products for shared finance users.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'trends': 'Increasing use of blockchain for secure transactions, rise of peer-to-peer lending platforms, and growth in micro-investment opportunities.', 'regulatory_updates': 'Stricter data protection laws, introduction of sandbox environments for fintech startups, and enhanced consumer protection measures.', 'future_directions': 'Expansion of AI in personalized financial advice, integration of IoT for real-time financial tracking, and development of decentralized finance platforms.', 'risk_measures': 'Implementation of robust KYC/AML processes, establishment of emergency liquidity reserves, and development of comprehensive insurance products for shared finance users.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 分析共享经济在金融服务领域的创新趋势。
